description:
Used in simulations by TimeCoordinator GNodes, expected to be the payload of a message. 

 * TimeCoordinators based on the gridworks-timecoordinator template expect this payload from a subset of actors in a simulation. Specifically, the TimeCoordinator has a notion of actors whose `Ready` must be received before issuing the next TimeStep.

* This Type is only intended for simulations that do not have sub-second TimeSteps.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12

FromGNodeAlias.title: The GNodeAlias of the actor sending the message

TimeUnixS.title: Latest simulated time for sender
TimeUnixS.description: The time in unix seconds of the latest TimeStep received from the TimeCoordinator by the actor that sent the payload
